ABOUT.EDUCATION1_DESCRIPTION: During the program, students acquire knowledge in algorithms, data structures, and programming paradigms, with a focus on efficient problem-solving. There is an in-depth study of web design and development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as the construction of interactive applications and business systems. The curriculum includes key subjects such as computer architecture, data networks, and operating systems, providing a solid understanding of the internal functioning of hardware and software. Data engineering is also studied, covering the modeling and management of relational and non-relational databases. Additionally, there is work on application testing, algorithm analysis, and software development processes, promoting best practices, code quality, and agile methodologies. In the final stage, the acquired knowledge is applied to application development and an integrative project, consolidating skills in creating efficient and scalable software.
ABOUT.EDUCATION2_DESCRIPTION: Certification in Java Backend with Spring Boot and Databases, covering from language fundamentals to database integration and REST API development. Training in object-oriented Java, including polymorphism, inheritance, exceptions, collection manipulation, and Lambda expressions. Management of JDBC for database connection and persistence with JPA and Hibernate, as well as advanced queries and performance optimization. Development of REST APIs with Spring Boot 3, applying best practices, security, and documentation. Knowledge in SQL with MySQL for data manipulation and querying. Complemented with training in Business Agility and agile management, including methodologies for organizational transformation. Also includes training in entrepreneurship, business model development with Lean Startup and Business Model Canvas, as well as skills in communication and effective presentations. Development of personal skills in learning techniques, productivity, and optimization of professional profile on LinkedIn.
ABOUT.EDUCATION3_DESCRIPTION: This is where my journey as a programmer began. I acquired knowledge in algorithmic logic and programming fundamentals, including control structures, functions, and data structures. In web development, I worked with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, addressing DOM manipulation, events, asynchrony with Promises and Fetch API, as well as the use of frameworks and libraries to enhance the user experience. In backend, I delved into Java, understanding the fundamentals of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), including classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, and interfaces. I implemented database access with JDBC and ORM frameworks like Hibernate for data persistence. I also learned about REST API with Java and best practices in backend development. In databases, I worked with MySQL, performing modeling, normalization, SQL queries, joins, subqueries, and stored procedures. Additionally, I gained experience in version control with Git and GitHub, applying workflows such as Git Flow for project collaboration. As a complement, I incorporated agile methodologies, particularly Scrum, for project planning and management, covering key roles, events, and artifacts such as sprints, product backlog, and daily meetings.
